name: OpsWay Magento training
body:
# Goal

We always meet the same problem teaching newcomers to do the same routine things in Magento right.
In order to save our time we have created this repository where we keep the very basic thinks of Magento that everyone should now.

Yeah, everything is organized as practical lessons to be done in forked repositories!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
